text:
The ISAPI filter does not remove the ;jsessionid= parameter from requests that 
are served directly by IIS.

This causes links to css, script and image files to be broken with jsp files.

Best regards,
Petteri Stenius
creator: petteri.stenius@ubisecure.com
mturk@apache.org
text:
Fixed in the CVS...
We are using url rewrite for session path parameter.
The drawback is that ';jsessionid' will get removed from all requests
send to IIS not matched by jk2, but IMO that's OK.
